sentences.sContent: There is plenty of truth in the cliché that a trouble shared is a trouble halved.
sentences.sCn: “有人分担，烦恼减半”这句老话说得很有道理。

remMethod.val: 音似“可理谁” → 总是陈词滥调， 还有谁可搭理？ → 陈词滥调

trans.tranOther: an idea or phrase that has been used so much that it is not effective or does not have any meaning any longer
